about_the_game:
Welcome to the Tiny Planet Protection Agency!

Your assignment: Protect, Clean, and Discover. Collect resources and encounter the inhabitants of nearby galaxies as you also fill your home planet with alien plants, futuristic tools, and uncover the greatest threat to the universe.


  • Explore a procedurally generated universe! Explore endless planets across multiple galaxies each with unique plants and lifeforms to study and collect. Complete calming and satisfying tasks to rebuild the universe planet by planet.


  • Farm, craft, and shape your home planet Return your collected items and resources to your home planet to craft your ideal home.


  • Uncover the greatest threat to the universe! Meet other TPPA agents and discover a mystery that may lead to a galactic divide.
detailed_description:
Follow and Wishlist Today!


About the Game

Welcome to the Tiny Planet Protection Agency!

Your assignment: Protect, Clean, and Discover. Collect resources and encounter the inhabitants of nearby galaxies as you also fill your home planet with alien plants, futuristic tools, and uncover the greatest threat to the universe.


  • Explore a procedurally generated universe! Explore endless planets across multiple galaxies each with unique plants and lifeforms to study and collect. Complete calming and satisfying tasks to rebuild the universe planet by planet.


  • Farm, craft, and shape your home planet Return your collected items and resources to your home planet to craft your ideal home.


  • Uncover the greatest threat to the universe! Meet other TPPA agents and discover a mystery that may lead to a galactic divide.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux (Most distributions should work)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3, AMD A4
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 8800 GT, AMD HD 6850, Intel HD 630
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04
  • Processor: Intel Core i5, AMD A6
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.12
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 (2.7 GHz)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS X 10.15 and higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 (3.1 GHz)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

name: Tiny Planet Protectors

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3, AMD A4
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 8800 GT, AMD HD 6850, Intel HD 630
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5, AMD A6
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Welcome to the TPPA! Your assignment: Protect, Clean, and Discover. Collect resources and encounter the inhabitants of nearby galaxies as you also fill your home planet with alien plants, futuristic tools, and uncover the greatest threat to the universe.
supported_languages:
English*, Russian*, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
